00025 KMCApplication::KMCApplication()
00026 {
00027     KMCCalculatorFactory::RegisterAll();
00028 }
00029 
00030 KMCApplication::~KMCApplication()
00031 {}
00032 
00033 void KMCApplication::Initialize() 
00034 {
00035     Application::Initialize();
00036     KMCCalculatorFactory::RegisterAll();
00037 
00038     AddProgramOptions()
00039             ("options,o", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  program and calculator options")
00040             ("file,f", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  sqlite state file");
00041 
00042     AddProgramOptions("Calculators")
00043             ("execute,e", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "list of calculators separated by commas or spaces")
00044             ("list,l", "lists all available calculators")
00045             ("description,d", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "detailed description of a calculator");
00046     AddProgramOptions() ("nthreads,t", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(1),
00047                          "  number of threads to create");
00048 }
00049 
00050 void KMCApplication::ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out)
00051 {
00052     string name =  ProgramName();
00053     if(VersionString() != "")
00054          name = name + ", version " + VersionString();
00055 
00056     votca::kmc::HelpTextHeader(name);
00057     HelpText(out);
00058     out << "\n\n" << OptionsDesc() << endl;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 void KMCApplication::PrintDescription(const char *name, const bool length)
00063 {
00064         // loading the documentation xml file from VOTCASHARE
00065         char *votca_share = getenv("VOTCASHARE");
00066         if(votca_share == NULL) throw std::runtime_error("VOTCASHARE not set, cannot open help files.");
00067         string xmlFile = string(getenv("VOTCASHARE")) + string("/kmc/xml/")+name+string(".xml");
00068         try {
00069             Property options;
00070             load_property_from_xml(options, xmlFile);
00071 
00072            if ( length ) { // short description of the calculator
00073                
00074                  cout << string("  ") << _fwstring(string(name),14);
00075                  cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>();
00076 
00077             } else { // long description of the calculator
00078                 cout << " " << _fwstring(string(name),18);
00079                 cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>() << endl;
00080  
00081                 list<Property *> items = options.Select(name+string(".item"));
00082 
00083                 for(list<Property*>::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter!=items.end(); ++iter) {
00084                     //cout << "Long description" << endl;
00085                     Property *pname=&( (*iter)->get( string("name") ) );
00086                     Property *pdesc=&( (*iter)->get( string("description") ) );
00087                     //Property *pdflt=&( (*iter)->get( string("default") ) );
00088                     if ( ! (pname->value()).empty() ) {
00089                         cout << string("  -") << _fwstring(pname->value(), 14);
00090                         cout << pdesc->value() << endl;
00091                     }
00092                  }
00093             }
00094             cout << endl;
00095         } catch(std::exception &error) {
00096             cout << string("XML file or description tag missing: ") << xmlFile << endl;
00097         }
00098 }
00099 
00100 // check if required options are provided
00101 bool KMCApplication::EvaluateOptions() {
00102 
00103            if(OptionsMap().count("list")) {
00104             cout << "Available calculators: \n";
00105             for(KMCCalculatorFactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin();
00106                     iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00107                 PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _short );
00108             }
00109             StopExecution();
00110             return true;
00111         }
00112 
00113 
00114          if(OptionsMap().count("description")) {
00115             CheckRequired("description", "no calculator is given");
00116             Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["description"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00117             // loop over the names in the description string
00118             for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n) {
00119                 // loop over calculators
00120                 bool printerror = true;
00121                 for(KMCCalculatorFactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin(); 
00122                         iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00123 
00124                     if ( (*n).compare( (iter->first).c_str() ) == 0 ) {
00125                          PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _long );
00126                         printerror = false;
00127                         break;
00128                     }
00129                  }
00130                  if ( printerror ) cout << "Calculator " << *n << " does not exist\n";
00131             }
00132             StopExecution();
00133             return true;
00134          }
00135 
00136         Application::EvaluateOptions();
00137 
00138         CheckRequired("execute", "no calculator is given");
00139         Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["execute"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00140         for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n)
00141             AddCalculator(Calculators().Create((*n).c_str()));    
00142         
00143         CheckRequired("options", "please provide an xml file with program options");
00144         CheckRequired("file", "no database file specified");
00145         
00146         _filename = OptionsMap()["file"].as<string > ();
00147         _nThreads = OptionsMap()["nthreads"].as<int>();
00148         
00149         //cout << " Database file: " << _filename << endl;
00150         return true;
00151 }
00152         
00153 
00154 void KMCApplication::AddCalculator(KMCCalculator* calculator)
00155 {
00156         _calculators.push_back(calculator);
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 void KMCApplication::Run()
00161 {
00162     load_property_from_xml(_options, _op_vm["options"].as<string>());
00163     BeginEvaluate();
00164     EvaluateFrame();
00165     EndEvaluate();
00166 }
00167 
00168 void KMCApplication::BeginEvaluate(){
00169     list<KMCCalculator *>::iterator iter;
00170     for (iter = _calculators.begin(); iter != _calculators.end(); ++iter){
00171         (*iter)->setnThreads(_nThreads);
00172         (*iter)->Initialize(_filename.c_str(), &_options);
00173         
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 bool KMCApplication::EvaluateFrame(){
00178     list<KMCCalculator *>::iterator iter;
00179     int i=0;
00180     for (iter = _calculators.begin(); iter != _calculators.end(); ++iter){
00181         (*iter)->EvaluateFrame();
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 void KMCApplication::EndEvaluate(){
00186     list<KMCCalculator *>::iterator iter;
00187     for (iter = _calculators.begin(); iter != _calculators.end(); ++iter){
00188         (*iter)->EndEvaluate();
00189     }
00190 }
